JANPATH, NEW DELHI
Dated: 27/11/2012

AVSEC CIRCULAR NO.: 19/2012

Subject: Permission for access of vehicle. up.to the aircraft in respect of Ms. Mayawati,

former Chief Minister of U.P.

In supersession of AVSEC Circular No. 18/2012 dated 26/11/2012 on the
subject cited above, it has been decided that in view of continued threat to the security
of Ms. Mayawati, former Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh, she may be allowed the
facility of proceeding to the aircraft in her own vehicle, with escort, during
departure/arzival by air from/to all civil airports in the country till further review.

This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA).
